name: Ciliates
description:
Ciliates was made in 3h for Trijam 96

Play as a protozoa as you fight to survive in a microscopic battle royale on a slide.  Maneuver the front of your protozoa into another ciliate to eat a chunk of them to grow bigger, but be careful not to let them eat you first.  The longer you exist the more food you use up until you shrink and die so time is of the essence.

Controls
  • WASD moves your protozoa up, down, left and right
  • Esc enters the pause menu
